creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: fabric covered multi-pocket folding thread container; front cover is printed fabric, printed with the words, "fragrant MEMORIES"; fabric covers on small inner pockets, painted (?); eleven compartments in all--largest (center) compartment contains multicolored threads in two sizes
title: Embroidery and Thread Case
